line: so thank you for the delicious dinner
you are welcome for a delicious dinner
hey what are you guys looking at
ross and the most beautiful girl in the world
probably the only time ever say this but did you see the ass on her
where did you when did you how did you
how did you get a girl like that
yeah so what is she like a
like a spokesmodel or an aerobics instructor what
actually she is a paleontology doctoral candidate specializing in the centazoic era
okay but that is like the easiest era
seen her at work but i always figured ah huh
but uh i made her dinner
and we are going out again tomorrow
well maybe she and her friends are just having a contest to see who can bring home the biggest geek
fine by me hope she wins
you guys have any wrapping paper
is it for my birthday present
phebes it was your birthday like months ago
yeah but remember you said you ordered something special and it just has not come yet
well i have a call in about that
actually this is for kathys birthday
it is an early edition of her favorite book
oh my god when the boys love makes the rabbit real
okay but do not touch it because you fingers have destructive oils
well then you had better keep it away from rosss hair
oh it was not a big deal
i just went to a couple of bookstores talked to a couple of dealers
called a couple of the authors grandchildren
oh honey that is so sweet
yeah and what a great way to say i secretly love you roommates girlfriend
how do you think it is gonna look when you get her something incredibly meaningful and expensive and her boyfriend joey gives her an orange
okay all right just uh make sure that uh joey gets her something really great
it is gotta be better than that book
yeah once again i am sorry
i just had to turn down a job catering a funeral for sixty people
so uh why did you have to turn it down
because i do not have the money or the equipment to handle something that big on such short notice
i mean there is no way
wow what is with all the negativity
you sound like monicannot not monican
look you know you have been playing around with this catering thing for over three years
do you want to be a caterer or not
there you go that is the spirit
now if you need money i will lend you money but just get moving
cause need like 500 for all the food and the supplies and stuff
it is worth it if it will get you moving
you have not worked in months
well you are not working either
can i borrow the keys to your apartment
it is okay the ducks using our bathroom anyway
what are you getting kathy for her birthday
we have only been going out for a couple of weeks do you think i gotta get her something
yes you have to get her something and it should be something really nice
and not one of your coupons for an hour of joey love
sorry honey it is just that last week i got all but three answers and i really want to finish a whole one without any help
but you cannot help me develop my new universal language
oh my god it was the best funeral ever
i mean everyone loved the food and guess what
i even got another funeral for tomorrow the dead guy from todays best friend
i mean it is like i am the official caterer for that accident
like check out my new catering stuff
well i did not realize that you needed it back right away
i mean you told me to go and be a caterer
i used it to buy all this stuff
but look got another job tomorrow so pay you back with the money i make from that
oo sorry i acted like a bank
um would you like to come in
did homo erectus hunt with wooden tools
i hope she is okay i have not seen her in a while
do you have any um cinnamon fruit toasties
why do not we go back to my place light a couple of candles break open a box of cinnamon fruit toasties uh
okay um do not take this the wrong way but your place kinda has a weird smell
oh is everything in the car
oh look what we almost left
well we are all cleaned up in the kitchen
um and well there is the
jack used to handle the finances
you know what we should all do
and you know which one we should see
do you happen to know the name of that one
okay so when do you want to go
man it is so hard to shop for girls
yes it is at office max
it is two gifts in one
it is a pen that is also a clock
and it is not the seventh night of hanukkah
okay honey what he means by that is
while this is a very nice gift maybe it is just not something a boyfriend gives
she needs a pen for work she is writing she turns it over
it is time for my date with joey
what did you get for angela delveccio for her birthday
she did not have a birthday while we were going out
look it is too late and i got an audition
i will go out and i will try to find something for her okay
and oh while you are at it could you get her a card
would you like me to write her a little poem as well
just get a card that has a poem already in it
but mon you have to get our money
oh phoebe she could not stop crying
with those thick glasses her tears looked giant
you know what the first thing i did after my mothers funeral was
look had a lot of jobs okay and there are some people who just always try to get out of paying
it is either you know that massage was not long enough or i do not recognize any of those songs or you know these sombreros are not big enough
well it seems like there were not any tears til you showed her the bill
phoebe she sounded pretty upset to me
you are a grand ol flag you are a high flying flag and forever in peace may you wave
emblem of the land i love
her place was really that bad
you know how you throw your jacket on a chair at the end of the day
well like that only instead of a chair it is a pile of garbage
and instead of a jacket it is a pile of garbage
and instead of the end of the day it is the end of time and garbage is all that has survived
i had to get out of there
next time you take her to your place
she says it has a weird smell
you wanna see her again right
so you are gonna have to do it in the mess
who cares about a little sloppiness
now you go get that beautiful pig
i just spent the entire afternoon looking for a present for kathy that would be better than the rabbit
yeah i found this great place called invisible things for kathy
can you give me a hand with all this stuff
why do not you just return the book let joey give her the clock pen and you give her something worse than that
she is really going to love this you know
the bottom line is i want her to have it even if i do not get to be the one who gives it to her
aw honey that is so sweet
you do not think it is just pathetic
been looking all over for you
is it like a book that is also a safe
no it is a book that is just a book okay
it is an early edition of the velveteen rabbit
it was her favorite book as a kid
let me know if she likes it okay
thanks for doing this i owe you one
there was not any change from that twenty was there
no it came out to an even twenty
that is almost as much as a new book
jeepers creepers where did you get those peepers
jeepers creepers where did you get those eyes
you did not get the money did you
maybe i can try at intermission
hey we are not leaving until we get paid
i do not know who she thinks she is
come on along and listen to
um clearly this is a very very hard time for you
um but um we provided a service and we deserve to be paid because you ate that service and um we are not leaving here until we are paid every penny
we are part time caterers and we have no place else to go
please think of us for you next event
so you want to come inside
oh thank god it is not mitzi
i did it all by myself
and there is nobody to hug
hey you guys i finished the crossword all by myself
hey how did the catering go
the widow would not pay so phoebe yelled at her til she did
you are not working right now and we have such a great time together
i can cook and you can take care of the money
it will be like i have a wife in the fifties
how did she like the gift
she is over there showing monica and rachel right now
hey listen i gotta tell ya i feel kinda bad taking credit for this because man am i gonna get a lot of credit for this
chandler got you a gift too
look it is right there on the counter
you really did not have to
see you think it is just a pen but then you turn it over and it is also a clock
um thank you for the gift
i just knew that sometimes when you are writing you
you do not always know the exact time
i did not mean the pen
i kinda have the feeling you had something to do with it
well uh when joey gave it to me he said this is because i know ya like rabbits and i know ya like cheese
and i know how hard it must have been for you to find
by the way in case you missed that that sound was uhl ell
to go to all that trouble for him
hey that coupon expires you know
you do not know me monica geller
oh you know that is too bad that did not work out
anyway he told me about your apartment
and um i could not sleep thinking about it
so uh would it be okay if i cleaned it
